item.title: Doomsdale
item.description: The prospects for human- species annihilation seem to be greater than ever before. Some of these topics are already being debated, without much success, like climate change and global pandemics; but there are others to which the majority of the population seems to be oblivious. AI is one of them. And now to that list of obscure topics that threaten our existence, I’ll have to add nuclear war. Step 1 is to get educatated.
